Title: Series: The Campbell Papyrus
Description: Book of the Dead of Panedjem II; sheet 4; Hieratic text.
Curator's comments: Published: I. Munro, 1996. Der Totenbuch-Papyrus des Hohenpriesters Pa-nedjem II. (pLondon BM 19793 / pCampbell), HAT 3, Wiesbaden. Tarasenko, Mykola. 2016. Studies on the vignettes from chapter 17 of the Book of the Dead. I, The image of mś.w Bdšt in ancient Egyptian mythology (Archaeopress Egyptology 16), Oxford, p. 7. Lenzo, G. 2023. The Book of the Dead in the Third Intermediate Period, in: Lucarelli, R. and M.A. Stadler (eds), The Oxford Handbook of the Egyptian Book of the Dead (online edn, Oxford Academic, 20 June 2023), 92.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (210)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134515) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134515)
